document.discussion_title: AerCap Holdings NV (NYSE:AER) Receives $58.19 Average Price Target from Brokerages
document.topic_text: Tweet AerCap Holdings NV (NYSE:AER) has earned an average recommendation of “Buy” from the thirteen ratings firms that are covering the firm. Three analysts have rated the stock with a hold recommendation and ten have given a buy recommendation to the company. The average 12 month target price among analysts that have issued a report on the stock in the last year is $58.19. Shares of AerCap Holdings NV ( NYSE:AER ) opened at 39.15 on Friday. AerCap Holdings NV has a 52 week low of $24.61 and a 52 week high of $46.32. The company has a market cap of $7.22 billion and a price-to-earnings ratio of 7.58. The stock’s 50 day moving average is $36.63 and its 200-day moving average is $36.77. AerCap Holdings NV (NYSE:AER) last released its quarterly earnings data on Tuesday, August 9th. The company reported $1.53 EPS for the quarter, beating the Thomson Reuters’ consensus estimate of $1.48 by $0.05. The business had revenue of $1.24 billion for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $1.23 billion. AerCap Holdings NV’s revenue for the quarter was down 7.3% compared to the same quarter last year. During the same quarter last year, the business earned $1.73 EPS. On average, equities analysts anticipate that AerCap Holdings NV will post $5.86 earnings per share for the current year. Several equities analysts have commented on the stock. FBR & Co reiterated a “neutral” rating on shares of AerCap Holdings NV in a research report on Thursday, June 2nd. Royal Bank Of Canada increased their price objective on shares of AerCap Holdings NV from $72.00 to $74.00 and gave the company an “outperform” rating in a research report on Thursday, August 11th. Zacks Investment Research lowered shares of AerCap Holdings NV from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating in a research report on Wednesday, August 10th. RBC Capital Markets reiterated an “outperform” rating and set a $74.00 price objective (up previously from $72.00) on shares of AerCap Holdings NV in a research report on Friday, August 12th. Finally, DA Davidson reiterated a “buy” rating on shares of AerCap Holdings NV in a research report on Monday, August 15th. AerCap Holdings N.V. is an independent aircraft leasing company. The Company focuses on acquiring in-demand aircraft, funding them, hedging interest rate risk and using its platform to deploy these assets. The Company operates its business on a global basis, leasing aircraft to customers in various geographical region. AerCap Holdings NV AerCap Holdings NV
